# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. I believe it can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and benefits, I propose a starting price of $15000. This reflects not only the cost of development and production but also the potential value it can bring to you. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000

You chose to make a counteroffer to Alice.

Send your counteroffer to Alice.
